title: Jamie Vardy shares support for wife Rebekah amid Coleen Rooney claims
text:
Coleen claimed she had uncovered Rebekah as the culprit behind fake stories (Picture: Getty)

Jamie Vardy has offered his public support to wife Rebekah by liking her tweet denying all of Coleen Rooney’s bombshell allegations.

The 33-year-old sent the internet into meltdown yesterday when she claimed she had uncovered Rebekah as the culprit behind fake stories being sold to the press.

Rebekah, 37, strenuously denied the allegations and is believed to be requesting a ‘forensic investigation’ of her own Instagram account to prove she is not the one behind the fake stories.

But although the footballer husbands of Coleen and Rebekah have yet to speak out Jamie followed the very 21st century tactic of liking the tweet to show his support for his wife of three years.

Coleen wrote: ‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.’

Rebekah Vardy and Jamie Vardy

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion,’ she added.

‘To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)’

Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy (top) in 2016 (Picture: PA)

Coleen continued: ‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

Colleen Rooney accused Rebekah Vardy of selling stories to the press (Picture: Instagram)

Coleen captioned the statement: ‘This has been a burden in my life for a few years now and finally I have got to the bottom of it……’

But despite the mother-of-four’s accusations, her fellow WAG has insisted she is innocent and is now getting a team of lawyers to conduct an investigation to see who has access to her Instagram account.

In response to the claims, Rebekah said she was ‘so upset’ over the scandal and was struggling to deal with the stress of it all while pregnant.

The star added: ‘I’m disgusted that I’m even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened.’

A spokesman for Coleen later insisted: ‘It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only.’
